item.title: 4 Podcasts Software Engineers May Love
item.description: As a non-native English speaker, I often try several methods to improve my English skills. Listening to podcasts is one of the most interesting way to practice English, especially with fascinating topics I indulge in. Therefore, I pick some of my favorite podcasts about software engineering to share with you. Enjoy these awesome shows and don’t forget to give them some feedback. (written on 2018-07-09) Software Engineering Daily If you are not afraid of information explosion, you may love Software Engineering Daily (SE Daily).
